short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open the wikipedia page for current website, with just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension lets you open the Wikipedia page for the current website open in your tab,with just one click.

For example:
www.facebook.com -> Opens Facebook Wikipedia page
drive.google.com -> Opens Google Drive page on Wikipedia

P.S:
1) If there is no Wiki page present for the website, it's not extension's fault. ;)
2)Comments and suggestions are more than welcomed.
